description: Combined state of the antenna proxy
The current receiver indexer position as a discrete mapped to the receiver band it is at.
Indicated if the tiltmeter pointing error correction is enabled or disabled
Currently applied pointing error correction in Az based on tiltmeter readout. Resolution: 0.01 arcsec
Currently applied pointing error correction in El based on tiltmeter readout. Resolution: 0.01 arcsec
Whether automatic delay parameter sending is on.
Observation parameters in key space value form
